title: Photoshop for iPad hands-on: an exclusive look
description: Adobes finally bringing Photoshop to the iPad in 2019, and its introducing a new cloud PSD file format thatll let you work on the same file across multiple devices with Creative Cloud. We got to test an early version of the app and our art department had a lot to say about it.
